$comment: OSCAL Assessment Results Format: JSON Schema

part.title: Part
part.description: A partition or component of a control or part

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

prose.title: Prose
prose.description: Prose permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

status.title: Status
status.description: Describes the operational status of the system.

user.title: System User Class
user.description: A type of user that interacts with the system based on an associated role.

role-id.title: Role Identifier Reference
role-id.description: A reference to the roles served by the user.

authorized-privilege.title: Privilege
authorized-privilege.description: Identifies a specific system privilege held by the user, along with an associated description and/or rationale for the privilege.

function-performed.title: Functions Performed
function-performed.description: Describes a function performed for a given authorized privilege by this user class.

component.title: Component
component.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

component-type.title: Component Type
component-type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

inventory-item.title: Inventory Item
inventory-item.description: A single managed inventory item within the system.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

asset-id.title: Asset Identifier
asset-id.description: Organizational asset identifier that is unique in the context of the system. This may be a reference to the identifier used in an asset tracking system or a vulnerability scanning tool.

implemented-component.title: Implemented Component
implemented-component.description: The set of componenets that are implemented in a given system inventory item.

responsible-role.title: Responsible Role
responsible-role.description: A reference to one or more roles with responsibility for performing a function relative to the control.

metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

back-matter.title: Back matter
back-matter.description: A collection of citations and resource references.

revision.title: Revision History Entry
revision.description: An entry in a sequential list of revisions to the containing document in reverse chronological order (i.e., most recent previous revision first).

link.title: Link
link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

rel.title: Relationship
rel.description: Describes a relationship of a link.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

published.title: Publication Timestamp
published.description: The date and time this document was published.

last-modified.title: Last modified timestamp
last-modified.description: Date and time of last modification.

version.title: Document version
version.description: The version of the document content.

doc-id.title: Document Identifier
doc-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

type.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: A value with a name, attributed to the containing control, part, or group.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

annotation.title: Annotation
annotation.description: A name/value pair with optional explanatory remarks.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

value.title: Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the characteristic.

location.title: Location
location.description: A location, with associated metadata that can be referenced.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

location-id.title: Location Reference
location-id.description: References a location defined in metadata.

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity, either singular (an organization or person) or collective (multiple persons)

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

party-id.title: Party Reference
party-id.description: References a party defined in metadata.

org.title: Organization
org.description: An organization or legal entity (not a person), with contact information

person-id.title: Personal Identifier
person-id.description: An identifier for a person (such as an ORCID) using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

org-id.title: Organization Identifier
org-id.description: An identifier for an organization using a designated scheme.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

rlink.title: Resource link
rlink.description: A pointer to an external copy of a document with optional hash for verification

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

short-name.title: short-name
short-name.description: A common name, short name or acronym

addr-line.title: Address line
addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for mailing address

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL for web site or Internet presence

text.title: Text
text.description: A line of textual content whose semantic is determined by the context of use.

biblio.title: Bibliographic Definition
biblio.description: A container in which a set of bibliographic information can included. The model of this information is undefined by OSCAL.

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A resource associated with the present document, which may be a pointer to other data or a citation.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A citation consisting of end note text and optional structured bibliographic data.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

role.title: Role
role.description: Defining a role to be assigned to a party

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

responsible-party.title: Responsible Party
responsible-party.description: A reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role relative to the parent context.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for display and navigation

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media type
media-type.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

description.title: Description
description.description: A description supporting the parent item.

remarks.title: Remarks
remarks.description: Additional commentary on the parent item.

import-ap.title: Import Assessment Plan
import-ap.description: Used by assessment-results to import information about the original plan for assessing the system.

href.title: hypertext reference
href.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

objectives.title: Objectives of Assessment
objectives.description: Identifies the controls and control being assessed and their control objectives. In the assessment plans, these are the planned controls and objectives. In the assessment results, these are the actual controls and objectives, and reflects any changes from the plan.

controls.title: Assessed Controls
controls.description: Identifies the controls being assessed. In the assessment plan, these are the planned controls. In the assessment results, these are the actual controls, and reflects any changes from the plan.

control-objectives.title: Control Objectives
control-objectives.description: Identifies the control objectives of the assessment. In the assessment plan, these are the planned objectives. In the assessment results, these are the actual objectives, and reflects any changes from the plan.

include-control.title: Include Control
include-control.description: Identifies an individual control to include.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

exclude-control.title: Exclude Control
exclude-control.description: Identifies an individual control to exclude.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

include-objective.title: Include Objective
include-objective.description: Identifies an individual control objective to include.

exclude-objective.title: Exclude Objective
exclude-objective.description: Identifies an individual control objective to exclude.

objective.title: Control Objective
objective.description: A local definition of a control objective. Uses catalog syntax for control objective and assessment actions.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

control-link.title: Control Link
control-link.description: Identifies a control to which this control objective is related.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

assessment-subject.title: Subject of Assessment
assessment-subject.description: Identifies system elements being assessed, such as components, inventory items, and locations. In the assessment plan, this identifies the planned assessment subject. In the assessment results this is the actual assessment subject, and reflects any changes from the plan.

include-subject.title: Included Assessment Subject
include-subject.description: Identifies exactly what will be the focus of this assessment. Anything not explicitly defined is out-of-scope.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

exclude-subject.title: Excluded Assessment Subject
exclude-subject.description: Identifies what is explicitly excluded from this assessment. Used to remove a subset of items from groups of explicitly included items. Also used to explicitly clarify off-limit items, such as hosts to avoid scanning.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

class.title: Class
class.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

id-ref.title: ID Reference
id-ref.description: A pointer to a resource based on its ID. Use type to indicate whether the identified resource is a component, inventory item, location, user, or something else.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

all.title: All
all.description: A key word to indicate all

local-definitions.title: Local Definitions
local-definitions.description: Allows control objectives, users, components, and inventory-items to be defined within the assessment plan or assessment results for circumstances where they are not appropriately defined in the SSP. NOTE: Use the assessment plan or assessment results metadata to define additional locations if needed.

assets.title: Assessment Assets
assets.description: Identifies the assets used to perform this assessment, such as the assessment team, scanning tools, and assumptions.

tools.title: Assessment Assets
tools.description: The technology tools used by the assessor to perform the assessment, such as vulnerability scanners. In the assessment plan these are the intended tools. In the assessment results, these are the actual tools used, including any differences from the assessment plan.

origination.title: Assessment Origination
origination.description: Identifies the origination of network-based assessment activities, such as the IP address of the tool performing assessment scans.

assessment-activities.title: Assessment Activities
assessment-activities.description: Identifies the assessment activities and schedule. In the assessment plan, these are planned activities. In the assessment results, these are the actual activities performed.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

sequence.title: Sequence Number
sequence.description: Identifies the sequence number for the test step.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Identifies the schedule for the assessment activities.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

start.title: Start
start.description: Identifies the start of a task.

end.title: End
end.description: Identifies the end of a task.

activitiy-id.title: Activity ID
activitiy-id.description: Links the task to a defined activity.

included-activity.title: Included Activity
included-activity.description: Identifies an assessment activity. In the assessment plan, this is an intended/in-scope activity. In the assessment results, this identifies an activity that was actually performed.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

excluded-activity.title: Included Activity
excluded-activity.description: Identifies an activity explicitly excluded from the assessment. In the assessment plan, this clarifies activities that are out-of-scope or prohibited. In the assessment results, this could be used to explicitly identify an activity that was planned, but not performed.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

evidence-inventory.title: Evidence Inventory
evidence-inventory.description: Used by the assessment results and the POA&M. In the assessment results, this enumerates all evidence associated with the assessment. In the POA&M, this enumerates evidence associated with deviation requests.

artifact.title: Evidence Artifact
artifact.description: Describes and links to an individual artifact used as evidence. In the assessment results, this relates to the assessment. In the POA&M, this relates to deviation requests.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

results.title: Assessment Results
results.description: Used by the assessment results and POA&M. In the assessment results, this identifies all of the assessment observations and findings, initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition. In the POA&M, this identifies initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

date-time-stamp.title: Date/Time Stamp
date-time-stamp.description: Date/time stamp identifying when the information was collected.

objective-status.title: Implementation Status
objective-status.description: Captures an assessors conclusions as to whether an objective is fully satisfied.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: An brief indication as to whether the objective is satisfied or not.

system.title: Assessment System
system.description: Identifies the framework or rules to which this value conforms.

implementation-status.title: Implementation Status
implementation-status.description: Identifies the implementation status of the control or control objective.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

relevant-evidence.title: Relevant Evidence
relevant-evidence.description: Links this observation to relevant evidence.

evidence-id.title: Evidence ID
evidence-id.description: Links to evidence information using its unique identifier.

type.title: Evidence Type
type.description: Points to a piece of evidence, relevant to this finding or risk.

assessor.title: Assessor
assessor.description: Identifies an individual who gathered the evidence resulting in the observation or risk identification.

party-id.title: Party ID
party-id.description: The party-id of the assessor who collected the evidence or made the observation.

target.title: Target
target.description: Identifies, on a granular level, what was examined or tested.

component-id.title: Component ID
component-id.description: Identifies the component that was examined or tested.

inventory-item-id.title: Inventory Item ID
inventory-item-id.description: Identifies the inventory item that was examined or tested.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Identifies the tool, interviewed person (party), test-method, implementation statement, or other relevant item.

ref-id.title: Reference ID
ref-id.description: A pointer, by ID, to a tool, interviewed person (party), test-method, implementation statement or other relevant item.

type.title: Reference ID Type
type.description: Indicates whether the reference points to a tool, person (party), test method, or implementation statement.

observation-type.title: Observation Type
observation-type.description: Identifies the nature of the observation. More than one may be used to further qualify and enable filtering.

threat-id.title: Threat ID
threat-id.description: A pointer, by ID, to an externally-defined threat.

system.title: Threat Type Identification System
system.description: Specifies the source of the threat information.

uri.title: URI
uri.description: An optional location for the threat data, from which this ID originates.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

remediation-tracking.title: Remediation Tracking
remediation-tracking.description: A log of events and actions taken towards the remediation of the associated risk.

tracking-entry.title: Tracking Entry
tracking-entry.description: Individual remediation tracking entry, which logs an event or action taken towards the remediation of the associated risk.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

risk-status.title: Status
risk-status.description: Describes the status of the associated risk.

closure-actions.title: Closer Actions
closure-actions.description: Describes the actions taken that resulted in the closure of the identified risk.

mitigating-factor.title: Mitigating Factor
mitigating-factor.description: Describes a mitigating factor with an optional link to an implementation statement in the SSP.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

implementation-id.title: Implementation ID
implementation-id.description: Points to an implementation statement in the SSP.

remediation.title: Remediation
remediation.description: Describes either recommendation or an actual plan for remediating the risk.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicating the type of identifier, address, email or other data item.

assessment-results.title: Security Assessment Results (SAR)
assessment-results.description: Security assessment results, such as those provided by a FedRAMP assessor in the FedRAMP Security Assessment Report.

id.title: Identifier
id.description: Unique identifier of the containing object
